title: Honoring the Memory of His Holiness Pope Francis
summary: The document is a proclamation by the President of the United States honoring the memory of His Holiness Pope Francis, issued on April 21, 2025. It directs that the flag of the United States be flown at half-staff at the White House, public buildings, military posts, and naval vessels across the country and its territories until sunset on the day of interment. The same protocol applies to U.S. embassies and military facilities abroad. This proclamation reflects a national gesture of respect and mourning for Pope Francis, marking a significant moment in U.S. history and its relationship with the Catholic Church.
